WelcomeScreen.WELCOME_SCREEN__DESCRIPTION: Streaming Community Awards for Spanish Speakers

WelcomeText.TITLE:
Welcome
to the ESLAND Awards
WelcomeText.FIRST_PARAGRAPH: While the film industry has the Oscars and the music industry has the Grammys, streaming has the ESLAND Awards. These awards celebrate the creativity and talent of the best content creators in the Spanish-speaking community.
WelcomeText.SECOND_PARAGRAPH: Spain, Latin America, and Andorra come together for creators and their communities, to reminisce and relive some of the best moments of the year.
WelcomeText.THIRD_PARAGRAPH: After two successful ceremonies, one at the Palau de la MÃºsica Catalana in Barcelona, and another at the National Auditorium in Mexico City, we eagerly await the third edition in Andorra.

ANDORRA.title: Andorra: The Zenith of the ESLAND Awards
ANDORRA.description: A new edition packed with novelties and content, kicking off several weeks before the highly anticipated ceremony. Special live streams, collaborations, concerts, and much more will make it a true celebration dedicated to content creation.

ALFOMBRA.title: The White Carpet
ALFOMBRA.subtitle: February 16, 2024
ALFOMBRA.description: This year, the blue carpet moment will be replaced and enhanced by the stunning landscapes of Andorra, featuring a white carpet in the snow situated on the ski slopes of Andorra.

GALA.title: THE GALA
GALA.subtitle: February 17, 2024
GALA.description: An awards gala filled with top-notch content and many surprises, where the winners of this third edition of the ESLAND Awards will be revealed.

REDDIT.title: ENJOY THE COMMUNITY'S REDDIT
REDDIT.description: This year, Reddit will not be part of the award voting, but it will be part of the community. The official ESLAND Awards subreddit is open for you to share your clips, opinions, and to interact with the entire Spanish-speaking streaming community.
